name.baseName: 碱回收|化学木浆|天然气|石灰窑|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程包括在化学木浆生产中的碱回收，使用天然气作为能源的石灰窑适合各种规模的厂房。末端污染物管理技术包括板式和管式静电除尘器、电袋复合除尘器和布袋过滤器，用于高效处理颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10），效率高达99.9%和99.74%。但是，提供的数据中没有指定管理二氧化硫、氮氧化物、废气和挥发性有机物的技术用途。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码22,三级代码221.0,四级代码2211文件，在完整版文件中第486页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为化学木浆，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectric-bag composite precipitator，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.9，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是电袋组合，其效率为99.9，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isPlate type, tube type electrostatic precipitator，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.9，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是板式、管式电除尘，其效率为99.9，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
